Index >  IfDuplexEnabled

IfDuplexEnabled

Description

Returns or sets whether the Source supports duplex. If true, the scanner scans both sides of a paper; otherwise, the scanner will scan only one side of the image.

Data type

bool

Default Value

false

Syntax

.IfDuplexEnabled = true;

Remarks

Not all scanners support Duplex. If necessary, you can call OpenSource() and confirm that the duplex is supported using Duplex

Call OpenSource() method before using this property.

When an error occurs, check ErrorCode or ErrorString for error information.

See also

Duplex
